msg: As rbb pointed out, two constructors are prone to bugs.  Remap our old

author: bnicholes
msg: Define _getch() and use the same getpass() implementation as Win32

author: kfogel
msg: (make_identity_table): New function to create a sbcs_table that
(apr_xlate_open): When topage and frompage are the same,
make_identity_table is used to create a shortcut instead of calling
iconv_open.  The reason being that iconv_open can fail in this case.

author: wrowe
msg: Eliminate the one Unix emit, and one of three Win32 emits.
The other two Win32 emits, setting the des from filedes/socketdes
[HANDLE -> int] shouldn't be cast around, and we will likely move
this code from poll/unix anyways.  The other emit, FD_SET errors,
are gone in the latest win32 clib implementations, and again, our
own win32 platform code will evaporate those problems.

author: bnicholes
msg: poll.c is not longer used or needed.  Removing from the network_io directory.
The current version is in poll/unix
